name: MAN Marketing
description: We’ve assembled some of the finest creative and media talent in the mid-west. We’ve built a production facility for print, broadcast, signage and direct mail that eliminates middleman markups and puts us firmly in control of both quality and turnaround time. Our client list reads like a who’s who of successful retailers. It’s little wonder that the media has dubbed us “The Swiss Army Knife of Advertising Agencies”.
